data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Apac, Uganda.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Apac, Uganda
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Apac, Uganda.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Apac, Uganda.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who are far from you in Apac. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Aringa people. 1.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, help 26 new simple churches start among the 131,100 people in the state of Apac, Uganda. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 65,468 people in the state of Apac who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Apac to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Apac
location.people_groups_list: Chinese, general, Kaliko, Plains Bira, Nubian, Amba
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chinese, general (19,000), Kaliko (13,000), Plains Bira (2,000), Nubian (37,000), Amba (54,000)
